subject: Boats and Boating
Oceans
Hurricanes and Tropical Storms
Budgets and Budgeting
lead_paragraph: The Velux 5 Oceans race has been so treacherous that some sponsors are now associated with abandoned boats and sailors fighting for their lives.
snippet: The Velux 5 Oceans race has been so treacherous that some sponsors are now associated with abandoned boats and sailors fighting for their lives.
